-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Hydrogen Command Line Arguments Parser
--   
@package hydrogen-cli-args
@version 0.17

module Hydrogen.CliArgs
data Option
switch :: String -> Option
optarg :: String -> Option
(~:) :: Char -> Option -> Option
(~?) :: Option -> (String -> Bool) -> Option
(~=) :: Option -> String -> Option
getOpts :: [Option] -> IO OptArgs
getOpts' :: [Option] -> [String] -> OptArgs

-- | A set of values <tt>a</tt>.
data Set a :: * -> *
class Has a where type family HasKey a :: * type family HasValue a :: *
(!) :: Has a => a -> HasKey a -> HasValue a
data MultiMap k v :: * -> * -> *
class Container a where type family Contained a :: *
(?) :: Container a => a -> Contained a -> Bool
type OptArgs = (MultiMap String String, Set String, [String])
instance Typeable Option
instance Show Option
instance Generic Option
instance Datatype D1Option
instance Constructor C1_0Option
instance Constructor C1_1Option
instance Constructor C1_2Option
instance Constructor C1_3Option
